name: Gun 'N Shun
description:
In order to run: main.py LMK if anything doesn't work!! Try to kil the enemies without getting killed yourself. The github is at: https://github.com/LMCuber/GunNShun

A shooter game with GUNS (and pastel background) I didn't have time to add silly music, so there's that. You control a cute little player and start with a basic gun. You have to shoot the enemies by clicking. When you unlock 1000 points, you can buy a (random) better gun! But watch out, the longer a round takes, the more tiles change to lava!

The 18mb zip file also includes the web build, although I haven't gotten it working on my machine yet.
